name: Shoot a Slime
description:
Shoot a Slime was completed over 2 weeks in early 2021. The purpose of this project was to have a "real world" opportunity to learn the basics of the Godot engine / tool set, and to learn enough about pixel art & animation to make graphics I can be proud of. I think I accomplished those goals pretty well, even if the gameplay is still very basic.

Try to get a high score! My highest score is 70, can you beat that?
